Title: [Qualification] Ask clarification questions (WARNING: This HIT may contain adult content. Worker discretion is advised.)
Description: ask questions about a situation to get more context
situation1: get divorced just because your kids want you to
situation2: being prepared for rain, even when the sun is shining
situation3: feeling annoyed when someone is begging for money
situation4: communicating issues you are having with others via email
situation5: John asks David to postpone their meeting until he is fully recovered
